definition: to hope/to wish/hope/wish/(old) name of an official post
full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards

sentences.english: The Ecraft workh element of Taurus can leadvertisement to strength mainly because well mainly because desire for solid ground form and structure.
sentences.chinese: 土相星座的特質讓金牛座祈望並具有腳踏實地的能力。

sentences.english: Far away there in the sunshine are my highest aspirations.
sentences.chinese: 高高地在遠處的陽光裏是我最深切的祈望。

sentences.english: They gave me the best opportunity I could hope for by sending me to Denver.
sentences.chinese: 把握送到丹佛，他們給了我我能祈望的最好的機會。

sentences.english: You must sincerely desire to be happy.
sentences.chinese: 你必須真誠地祈望幸福生活。

sentences.english: And shall my desires flow like a fountain that I may fill their cups?
sentences.chinese: 我的祈望應湧出如泉水，注滿他們的杯？

sentences.english: Ser Barristan was sure he would return, though. Dany could only pray that he was right.
sentences.chinese: 但巴利斯坦爵士確信他會回來，丹尼只好祈望那沒錯。

sentences.english: He was very solicitous for her safe return.
sentences.chinese: 他心神不定，祈望她平安歸來。

sentences.english: So they have decorated their school with paper origami cranes. Their wish is for a speedy recovery for the Japanese people.
sentences.chinese: 他們用紙鶴裝飾他們的學校，祈望日本人民早日恢復。

definition: to expect/to look forward to/anxious for sth/to hope (to get sth)
to seek for/to hope to gain/desirous
to pray/to pray for sth/to wish sth/prayer/wish
abundant harvest of all food crops/bumper grain harvest
long-lived people, rich harvests (idiom); stable and affluent society/prosperity
to hope for/to look forward to
favorable weather (idiom); good weather for crops
